description: The Journal of Ancient History and Archaeology is seeking to publish profound, rigorous, well-written, high-quality, high-impact papers to generate discussion, debate, fresh perspective.The research area is the European continent and the Near East in the Greek-Roman times. The topics are: ancient history, ancient philology, epigraphy, papyrology, numismatics, archaeological material, archaeological reports, digital archaeology, archaeometry, reviews.We intend to have four issues per year.
history: 2015-06-03T04:59:39.759889: Data automatically parsed from content of http://ancientworldonline.blogspot.com/2013/12/call-for-papers-journal-of-ancient.html. (walk_to_json.py)
title: Call for papers: Journal of Ancient History and Archaeology
